summary: This bill, the Shawnee Trail Riders Attaining Individuals Liberties Act (or Shawnee TRAILS Act), directs the Secretary of Agriculture to designate and maintain at least 20% of trails in the Shawnee National Forest for recreational use by covered vehicles (electric bikes and OHVs). The Secretary is required to manage and monitor these trails, ensuring recreational use, minimizing environmental impacts, and keeping at least one trail open at all times. The bill also prohibits the Secretary from banning covered vehicles on paved roads within the forest.
